fulltext:
1 of 5 
Lại Quang Vinh  
Phone number: 0937155357 or 0346608736 
Email: laiquangvinh1807@gmail.com  
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/vinh-lai-quang-1807/  
Address: 12 Nguyễn Hữu Thọ - Nhà Bè District - Hồ Chí Minh City 
Career Summary: 
• Self-directed, detail-oriented, and professional engineer with 8 years of experience in 
designing, developing, analyzing and implementing client-server, web and desktop-based 
applications and strong expertise in technical background. Expertise in system designing 
as well as in testing, debugging and modifying related application code. Capable of 
learning new programming languages and technologies and complete projects within 
specified deadlines. Possess excellent communication, problem-solving, documentation, 
analytical, and decision solving skills. 
• Love working in English-speaking environment and have experienced in working with 
foreign colleagues and foreign customers and working abroad such as India. 
• Looking for a new job in the south of Ho Chi Minh City (District 7, District 4, District 1, 
…) and can start working from August-2019. 
Summary of Skills: 
• Thorough knowledge of programming concepts, SDLC, testing and debugging methods, 
system design and implementation, relational database system, program documentation, 
web and desktop application development 
• Proficient in Object oriented programming such as C#, Java, C, C++ as well as 
experience with MySQL Server, ASP. NET MVC, and ORM frameworks 
• Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, web services, Visual Studio, design 
and architectural patterns, and window services 
• Have background about Embedded System 
• Experience in interviewing candidates in technical round in English 
• Ability to analyze and understand complex problems, and generate appropriate technical 
solutions independently 
• Effective communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to maintain good 
relations and share technical ideas with users or clients, technical and management staff 
• Excellent leadership and mentoring skills as well as the ability to work independently and 
within teams 
2 of 5 
• Strong organizational skills along with the ability to accomplish multiple tasks under 
extreme pressure, and meet specific deadlines 
• Ability to grasp and apply new concepts quickly and stay updated with latest trends and 
technical advancements 
Technical Skills: 
• OS: Windows, Linux and Android 
• Languages: C#, .NET, Java, Angular, Typescript, JavaScript, CSS, VBA, HTML, XML 
• IDE: Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code, NetBeans, Eclipse 
• Database: MySQL 
• Tools: TortoiseSVN, Git, JIRA, Rational Team Concert (RTC) 
• Very energetic and ready to take new challenges 
• Excellent communication and presentation skills 
• Favorite topics: .NET Core, Blockchain 
Employment History & Projects 
• 5/2013 - Present: Specialist/Senior Software Engineer (Level 52) at Robert Bosch 
Engineering and Business Solutions Vietnam 
o 10/2018 to present: WebFLOW Migration 
▪ WebFLOW is web application with front-end which is using Silverlight 
and back-end which is using ASP.NET MVC. They are using WCF for 
communication. The goal of WebFLOW Migration project is to develop 
an Angular application for the front-end part to reuse the back-end part 
due to deprecated Silverlight application framework 
▪ Contribution: Providing support in designing, developing, analyzing, 
testing, debugging and executing Angular application. Collaborating with 
other programmers and developers in the whole development process, and 
using structured analysis and design to determine steps to develop 
programs. Researching and evaluating new development tools and 
software products to increase programming capabilities as well as creating 
written developers guides 
▪ Team Size: 4 – 6 (Working with German and Indian colleagues as a team) 
▪ Technical skills: Angular, ASP.NET, Silverlight, Visual Studio Code, 
PrimeNG, Bootstrap 3 
▪ Language:  C#, Typescript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, XSLT, XML, JSON 
▪ Platform: Windows 
o 3/2014 to 5/2019: Labcar Tools 
3 of 5 
▪ The "Labcar Tools" are tools (set of tools) to make the usage of LabCar 
easier 
▪ Contribution: Responsible for topics as Product Owner. Managed a 
development team and developed software code using C#, Java 
programming language to meet design specifications, and user 
requirements as well as delivered high-quality applications within 
specified deadlines. Trained programmers in new techniques as well as 
assisted in reviewing codes 
▪ Team Size: 4 – 6 
▪ Management Skills: JIRA, IBM Rational Team Concert (RTC) 
▪ Role played: Developer, Team Leader, Scum Master, Product Owner 
▪ IDE: Visual Studio, NetBeans 
▪ Platform: Windows 
▪ Tools: 
• System Test Configurator is WinForms application for 
generating system test plan in Excel format. (Technologies: C#, 
WinForms, VBA, NAnt, CCNet, XML, XSD) 
• Start Labcar Tools is tools for starting the manual test and 
automation test on LABCAR. (Technologies: C#, WinForms, 
NAnt, CCNet) 
• Labcar Reservation is web application for booking LABCAR. 
(Technologies: Java EE, MySQL, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, 
CSS, Servlet, JSP, EJB) 
• Model Release Tool is WPF application for supporting model 
developer to release models to end user. (Technologies: C#, WPF, 
XAML, WiX Toolset) 
o 9/2014 - 12/2015: DebugAssist  
▪ DebugAssist is an Eclipse RCP that provide IDE for debugging embedded 
systems (TriCore microcontroller) 
▪ Team Size: 1 
▪ Technologies: Eclipse RCP, Eclipse CDT, GDB MI 
▪ Language: Java 
▪ Platform: Windows 
4 of 5 
o 9/2013 - 12/2013: OpenOCD 
▪ The Open On-Chip Debugger (OpenOCD) aims to provide debugging, in-
system programming and boundary-scan testing for embedded target 
devices. We support OpenOCD for debugging TriCore based target 
▪ Team Size: 3 
▪ Technologies: TriCore processor 
▪ Language: Java, C 
▪ Platform: NetBeans Platform, Eclipse Platform 
o 7/2013 - 12/2013: MDMTest Planner 
▪ Tool for planning test based on ASAM ODS standard 
▪ Team Size: 4 
▪ Technologies: JavaFX, Web Service 
▪ Language: Java 
▪ Platform: Windows 
o 6/2013 to 7/2013: Teleheater Library 
▪ Teleheater Library is developed based on C/C++ for cross-platform 
implementation. It contains Data Model, Connectivity and Services 
(Multi-threading) which can be re-used for both Android and IOS 
platform. It supports Multicast DNS 
▪ Team Size: 4 
▪ Technologies: JNI, GNU Build 
▪ Language: C++, Java 
▪ Platform: Linux, Android, Mac OS 
• 9/2012 - 5/2013: Associate Software Engineer at VNG Corporation 
o 9/2012 - 5/2013: CSMTalk  
▪ CSMTalk is free voice chat software for end-user/gamer with powerful 
features  
▪ Team Size: 4 
▪ Technologies: ATL (COM) 
▪ Language: C++ 
5 of 5 
▪ Platform: Windows 
• 7/2011 - 9/2012: Junior Software Engineer at ISB Vietnam Company Limited (IVC) 
o 7/2011 - 9/2012: Android Printing Framework 
▪ Android Printing Framework is a development framework on Android 
which enable printing ability on Android based devices. Developer can 
use the Application Programming Interface (API) in various ways to 
control a lot of things of printing without worry about hardware, protocol, 
sockets, or any complicated technologies 
▪ Team Size: 4 
▪ Technologies: JNI, LPD protocol, TCP/IP protocols 
▪ Language: C/C++, Java 
▪ Platform: Linux, Windows, Android 
Education 
• 2007 - 2012 Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology (HCMUT – Bach Khoa) 
o Degree: Bachelor of Engineering (B.Eng.) 
o Grade: 7.85 
o Finished Talented program of the Computer Engineering 
Courses  
• Team Leader Essentials 
• Critical Professional Skills for Success 
• Interview Skills 
• N4 Japanese class 
Interests  
• Play sports such as football, tennis, table tennis, badminton, cycling, … 
• Participation in art and entertainment activities such as singing, dancing, ... 
• Participate in social activities and charity
